snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg attended a ribbon-cutting ceremony as Brooklyn Bridge Park took a significant step toward completion.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg attends ribbon-cutting ceremony at Brooklyn Bridge Park, which takes a significant step toward completion with the opening of three athletic fields, two playgrounds and a picnic area on Pier 5.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg attended a ribbon-cutting ceremony as Brooklyn Bridge Park took a significant step toward completion.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Bridge Park Advances as Sports Fields and Picnic Area Open
headline.main: Fields and Picnic Area Open in Brooklyn Park
headline.print_headline: Fields and Picnic Area Open in Brooklyn Park
